Review Text: one of the true hidden gems of Amsterdam! Nice views, nice people, good atmosphere and drinks..

Name: Het Mandelahuisje
Review Text: Bad quality reggaeton on the speakers of Mandelahuis? Disgraceful!, try Makeba to start with or any good music that match the place! I waited for the next song and the same,so I left, good music does not bother anybody, but reggaeton? For the Noord sunset? Really?

Name: Het Mandelahuisje
Review Text: Great spot to chill when the sun is out. On the other side of the IJ in Amsterdam Noord, so away from the busy streets and noisy city life, this terrace that is run by Dutch social entrepreneur and do-gooder Ilco van der Linde is an oasis of tranquility and peace. Only open when the temperature rises above T-shirt levels in summer.

Name: Het Mandelahuisje
Review Text: Amazing place that Brings back the spirit of Nelson Mandela. Bringing peace to conflicts in Amsterdam, very well done Ilco by setting up such a great initiative!
